short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring a touch of magic to your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring luminous mushrooms and delicate blue butterflies glowing in the night. This background creates a dreamy, whimsical atmosphere for your browsing experience.

Key features:
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
- Beautiful magic background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- News
